title: Allegiant Pro-Life Conservative Donors
shortDescription: Active conservative Christian donors defending the right to life and freedom.
description: Reach active conservative Christian donors who have made donations to a political PAC defending the right to life and freedom. This group works to support candidates who steadfastly believe that life begins at conception.

title: America First Patriot Donors
shortDescription: Freedom-loving donors unwilling to see the country destroyed by socialist policies.
description: Reach an audience of freedom-loving America First donors! These patriotic Americans love their country and are unwilling to stand on the sidelines and watch it be destroyed by the socialist policies of the Biden Harris Administration.

title: Americans Against the Biden Agenda
shortDescription: Patriotic Americans who stand against bureaucracy and progressive doctrine.
description: Compounded of patriotic Americans who stand against bureaucracy and progressive doctrine. These donors are averse to tax hikes, federal mandates, reckless federal spending, gun control, abortion, and other progressive policy pushed by the Biden administration.

title: Build The Wall Donors
shortDescription: Engaged citizens supporting strong borders and reduced illegal immigration.
description: Reach this active and engaged audience of American citizens who support efforts to reign in out-of-control illegal immigration. These donors support Trump and his promises to strengthen our nation's borders, including the construction of a border wall.

title: CITIZEN AG — a DSG Property
description: Nonprofit advocating for Americans in the courts; pro-Constitution donors focused on ballot integrity.
short_description: A DSG donor file available via Allegiance List Marketing.

title: CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS PAC — a DSG Property
description: Hard-hitting, pro-America, pro-Trump donor file with high average gift; strong for conservative candidates and PACs.
short_description: A DSG donor file available via Allegiance List Marketing.

title: Catholic Action Donors
shortDescription: Nationwide Catholic donors passionate about advancing the faith and ending abortion.
description: An ideal list for those looking to reach a nationwide audience of Catholic Americans. These highly active donors are incredibly passionate about advancing the Roman Catholic way of life, sharing the Gospel and ending abortion.

title: College Republican National Committee
shortDescription: Donors supporting programs to engage young voters on campuses nationwide.
description: The College Republican National Committee is the largest, oldest and most active Republican youth organization in the country today. Donors on this list are dedicated to CRNC's mission to engage young voters on campuses across our nation.

title: Donors to Veteran Causes
shortDescription: Patriotic Americans supporting organizations that help our Veterans.
description: Target a donor audience of patriotic Americans who support organizations and missions invested in helping our Veterans. These generous individuals respect and honor the sacrifice that the men and women who served our great country made.

title: FRIENDS OF THE NATIONAL WORLD WAR II MEMORIAL — a DSG Property
description: Donors supporting the legacy of WWII veterans through education, commemoration, and patriotic programs.
short_description: A DSG donor file available via Allegiance List Marketing.

title: GATOR PAC DIRECT — a DSG Property
description: Right-of-center, pro–America First donors and activists; strong response to premium offers and election-integrity messaging.
short_description: A DSG donor file available via Allegiance List Marketing.

title: GREAT AMERICA MASTERFILE — a DSG Property
description: High-gift pro-Trump donor masterfile; rental only; strong for America First campaigns, candidates, and PACs.
short_description: A DSG donor file available via Allegiance List Marketing.

title: Gator PAC — a DSG Property
description: Right-of-center donors backing President Trump’s America First agenda; premium-offer responders focused on election integrity.

title: Pro-Life America
shortDescription: Staunch pro-life donors committed to advancing the pro-life movement.
description: These staunch pro-life donors are committed to supporting policy that advances the pro-life movement and electing officials who will always work to protect and defend the unborn.

title: Real America Donors
shortDescription: Patriotic Americans opposing the progressive agenda; America First values.
description: The Real America Donor audience is made up of patriotic Americans who are boldly in the fight to not only stop the progressive agenda of the Biden/Harris Administration, but to see a truly America First administration in the White House. They support Constitutional issues including Second Amendment Rights, Freedom of Speech and Religion and limited government.
